message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10. It's a good deal, especially considering the inflation!
It's still early, let's not rush into a bad deal. A 50/50 split is a fair starting point.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. Let's go with 70 for me, 30 for you.  We can't keep rejecting each other, the inflation will eat away at our profits!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but 40 is the lowest I'll go.
